TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, I eat the croissant and I own the factories.

I wish for less exams.

(That mind seems to be quite sane when compared with mine)

That's too easy. Because you didn't score well on your homework, having less exams means you now flunk because you can't use the exam score to save your GPA.

I wish my inventions would actually work properly.

Granted, the do the exact opposite of what they are intended to do perfectly.

I wish for a madder mind.

Granted. You're now me. Have fun. >

I wish for an easy way to deal with space debris that doesn't involve "cheating".

Granted, its by building a overcomplicated rocket that takes out 1 piece of debris per launch

I wish for a madder mind than satcharna.

Granted, you're now- ERROR.

I wish for Planetes to release quicker.

Granted, now it was released 57 years ago and is hence based off outdated ideas with a massive heap of anti-USSRism to boot.

I wish that Estonia was called Estland

It actually already is, in Sweden.

I wish for some Soviet manga.

Granted, but, like the N1, it explodes when you try to use it.

I wish Estonia was called Estland in English.

Granted. Wont corrupt that as I want to see that.

I wish for my fingers to stop being irritated.

Granted. Wont corrupt that as I want to see that.

I wish for my fingers to stop being irritated.

Granted. Now your toes are.

I wish that LeonG17 possessed no irration upon his body.

Granted. He has irritation in his liver.

I wish for less more.

Granted. Here's a roll of Charmin ultra toilet paper, less is more.

I wish I had a working transporter.

Granted, but this happens to you when you use it: www.youtube.com/watch?v=ibBTZyQpVAA

I wish that pain didn't hurt as much.

Edited May 23, 2013 by (An Original Name)

Granted, you don't feel any pain so you die as you can't feel any injuries.

I wish to be the maddest person here.

Granted. Get back into the insanity depository.

I wish for dubstep of the gods.

granted it kills anyone who listens to it

i wish to be able to get to spaace

granted it kills anyone who listens to it

i wish to be able to get to spaace

Granted, its by attaching yourself to a SRB but forgetting your Spacesuit.

I wish for a working spacesuit

Granted. It's a Kerbal's idea of "working"

I wish I didn't have to use my phone for the forum currently.

Granted, its through a computer that takes a year to start.

I wish for a Kerbal's idea of a working spacesuit, they have infinite food and water, have very good RCS, can survive re-entry and the helmet can survive anything, even landing on it from orbit.

Granted. There's a leak in it.

I wish for my swagger to raise the roof.

Granted. Fortunately, the roof quickly comes crashing down, irreparably damaging your swagger.

I wish for a new Dr Who episode.

Granted, but it was changed to "Dr. What" and moved into a different timeslot without even announcing, thus you making you, unaware of the things that just happened, miss it.

I wish for apple.

Granted, the universe turns into a massive apple.

I also wish for a new Doctor Who episode to solve the cliff-hanger.

Granted, but Doctor Hurt never shows up.

I wish for a croissant.
